titles.title: JAWS Act
Justice Attributed to Wounded Sharks Act

To prohibit foreign assistance to countries that do not prohibit shark finning in the territorial waters of the country or the importation, sale, possession, or consumption of shark fins obtained as a result of shark finning.
JAWS Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: Justice Attributed to Wounded Sharks Act or the JAWS Act - Prohibits federal assistance to a country that does not prohibit: (1) shark finning in its territorial waters; and (2) the importation, sale, possession, or consumption of shark fins obtained by shark finning.
